knimeNode.name: Expand Well Position
knimeNode.shortDescription: Expands a well position column (containing entries like AC14, B3) into two columns named 'plateRow' and 'platecolumn'.

fullDescription.intro: Expands a well position column (containing entries like C12, B3) into two columns named 'plateRow' and 'plateColumn'. Additional splitting characters (comma, colons, semicolons, underscore) between the letter and the column number will be ignored.
fullDescription.option: The column which contains well positions encoded as c12, B3
If enabled, the row character (e.g. C) will be converted automatically into a row number (e.g. 3)
If enabled, the selected column will be removed and just the expansion columns (plateRow and plateColumn) will be kept.

ports.outPort: The same table as before but with an expanded well position.
